name: Tandemania (JackCLGames)
description:
Requires an Xbox controller.

Control a couple riding a tandem bike and help them reach the finish line on the other end of a tricky course.

Best played with two people on the same controller, each controlling one of the sides of the bike

Created in collaboration with:

Thomas Crowe:

https://love-from-tom.itch.io/

https://twitter.com/LoveFromTom?s=09

Aidan Murray:
